page.title: 16Unemployment-the CTF project
page.content: One way of improving the neighbourhood in this area is by making use of the Community Task Force.The C.T.F. project is designed to give work to unemployed young people.At Cuckney they are at present renovating the churchyard.The workers are aged from 17 to 25 and do the work for one year. They receive a wage of Â£54 per week.The young people are from Warsop, Shirebrook and Ollerton.They learn how to do brick-laying,land sculpture etc. Mr Lewis and his chargehand instruct them.No special skills are required before they can join the project.They work 24 hours 30 minutes per week with different people working at different times in teams.When they have finished they hope that their experience will enable them to apply successfully for a permanent job somewhere although these are scarce at the present time.
